svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/132.0.0.0" version="26.0.11"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="tKIoueqFx9eAkQaHiam_"> <mxGraphModel grid="1" page="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-1" value="Début du niveau" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="-40" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-2" value="Est-ce-que Mario<div>avait encore des</div><div>vies restantes?&nbsp;</div>" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="280" width="130" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-3" value="Mario meurt" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="120" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-1" target="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="364" y="100" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="414" y="50" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-9" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="340" y="420" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="279" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="50" y="420" /> <mxPoint x="50" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-10" value="Vrai" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="388" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-11" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="340" y="420" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="340" y="480" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-12" value="Retour au début du jeu avec 5 vies et aucun item" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="285" y="480" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ruY1Ne9O05Vg31Qp7Vnl-14" value="Faux" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="430" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 238px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 233px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Est-ce-que Mario
avait encore des
vies restantes?
